contentfulProjectEntry.title: Ration for Boonee area delivery in Upper Chitral

childMarkdownRemark.html:
100 Families will be served in the Boonnee area of Upper Chitral.

The ration reached Boonee late at night in a larger delivery truck. The Ration packs are stored in Boonee Head Quarter for distribution in 10 locations of Upper Chitral. Total 378 ration packs (for 378 families) dispatched so far.

From Boonee, smaller vehicles carry the ration to the remote locations. Due to distances and far flung areas, it takes time to reach remote locations.

100 Families will be served in Boonnee. The ration reached Boonee late at night in a larger delivery truck. Ration is stored in Boonee HQ for distribution in 10 locations of Upper Chitral. From there, smaller vehicles carry the ration to remote locations.

Total 378 ration packs (for 378 families) dispatched so far.
